title: 2021 Canyon Torque CF Fabio Wibmer LTD signature edition carbon enduro bike
content:
Canyon’s long-travel do-it-all Torque CF enduro bike adds a new limited pro signature edition to bring you the same bike setup as trials-to-DH shredder Fabio Wibmer. Whether you call it an enduro bike, freeride, or a “fun-loving bikepark machine”, the Torque CF is a gravity-ready bike capable of anything you can dish out. And this […]

The post 2021 Canyon Torque CF Fabio Wibmer LTD signature edition carbon enduro bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
